channel.title: Audio wareZ 🎹 Professional Audio Software Community
channel.description: Audio wareZ 🎹 Professional Audio Software Community

item.title: Boom Bap Labs Amen Grimey Gems The Production Vault Series 7005 WAV-FANTASTiC
item.description:
FANTASTiC | 03 June 2024 | 172.79 MB
AMEN FROM HELLZWIND PRESENTS GRIMEY GEMS 7005 VINYL SAMPLES PACK
All samples in this pack are not royalty-free. Continuing this epic series, Amen goes deeper than ever in his private super secret stash. This pack contains 42 samples carefully selected to give you the maximum rawness all in the same pack. All files are in universal WAV format at 44.1 kHz sample rate and 16 bits resolution. All samples are curated by Amen.
item.dc:creator: Fantastic

item.title: Plugin Alliance Unfiltered Audio Battalion v1.0.4 macOS
item.description:
macOS | JUNE 2024 | 759 MB
Sonic pioneers Unfiltered Audio are back with Battalion, an unparalleled auditory experience marrying the timeless tonalities of classic synths with the sampling capabilities of modern drum machines. Battalion’s hybrid design integrates state-of-the-art sampling with deep synthesis capabilities. Traverse sonic landscapes beyond expectation.
item.dc:creator: JammuAnd

item.title: Blastwave FX Pistols and Revolvers WAV-FANTASTiC
item.description:
FANTASTiC | 02 June 2024 | 285 MB
The complete collection of pistol and revolver sounds, from loading the chamber to firing a bullet. ...
item.dc:creator: Fantastic

item.title: Tonepusher Synthwave Dream Serum Preset-Keyo
item.description:
Keyo | 5 June 2024 | 662 KB
Tonepusher is proud to present our new pack called ''Synthwave Dream''. This new pack is a high fidelity collection of classic 80s inspired Xfer Serum sounds. Each sound has been meticulously designed from the ground up and have been inspired by early 80s electronica. Inspired by classic video game soundtracks, synthwave, cyberpunk and 1980’s film music. Find every type of retro sound you’ll need, many with cutting edge sonic twists and turns, and all of them with your music projects in mind. Including 50 Xfer Serum presets such as Basses, Bells, Leads, Synths, Pads, FXs and Brasses to add a retro futuristic vibe to your next productions. Whether you want to deconstruct the sounds and learn how it's been made or simply use them in your next production, each sound is mix ready for your next 80s hit. As with all our Serum packs, each preset has all 4 macros usefully assigned.
item.dc:creator: hidera

item.title: Mix Elite Memoriam Serum Presets Collection-FANTASTiC
item.description:
FANTASTiC | 02 June 2024 | 164 MB
We hate browsing through countless of digital and basic sounding Serum presets sounds with no soul. This collection is the GO TO library of our producers. It’s not only a complete collection of the best 100+ Serum Presets for Trap, Hip-Hop, House, EDM… it’s also a collection of Full Song Starters for each preset! Over 100+ unique song ideas righ under your finger tips. You WILL MAKE LOVE with this pack.
item.category: Samples, loops, presets, patches, impulses, MIDI, SF, Akai
item.dc:creator: Fantastic

item.title: Safari Pedals Everything Bundle v2024.05.16 Incl Keygen-R2R
item.description:
Team R2R | 2024.06.04 | 174.6 MB
Join the wild side of audio and be part of the animals lovers club with our Everything Bundle. It's not just a bundle; it's a journey through diverse sonic landscapes, crafted for producers and engineers who dare to stand out. From intricate reverbs to dynamic distortions, we wildin!. Embrace the full spectrum of safari pedals with the Everything Bundle – where every pedal tells a story.
item.dc:creator: funtime

item.title: Plugin Boutique Scaler 2.v2.9.0 Regged (WiN and macOS)-R2R
item.description:
Team R2R | 2024.06.04 | 913.5 MB/1.43 GB
Scaler 2 is an inspirational and powerful music theory workstation that gives you access to a world of new ideas, expressions and melodies. With powerful detection of MIDI and audio, Scaler 2 can determine what key and scale you’re in and suggest chords that match your music. The plugin helps you discover the perfect melody with performance expressions, and can even suggest ways to change from one key to another.
item.dc:creator: funtime

item.title: Pulsar Modular P455 MDN Sidecar v1.5.1 Incl Keygen-R2R
item.description:
Team R2R | 2024.06.04 | 11.6 MB
The P455 MDN Sidecar is a summing and 2-bus mixing and mastering audio plugin capturing the analog chain of Marc Daniel Nelson, a two-time Grammy and French Academy Award-nominated mixing engineer, music producer, creative director and educator.
item.dc:creator: funtime

item.title: Pulsar Modular P450 MDN EQ v1.2.1 Incl Keygen-R2R
item.description:
Team R2R | 2024.06.04 | 8.2 MB
The P455 MDN Sidecar is a summing and 2-bus mixing and mastering audio plugin capturing the analog chain of Marc Daniel Nelson, a two-time Grammy and French Academy Award-nominated mixing engineer, music producer, creative director and educator.
item.dc:creator: funtime

item.description:
FANTASTiC | 02 June 2024 | 287.63 MB
AMEN FROM HELLZWIND PRESENTS GRIMEY GEMS 7006 VINYL SAMPLES PACK
All samples in this pack are not royalty-free. Continuing this epic series, Amen goes deeper than ever in his private super secret stash. This pack contains 68 samples carefully selected to give you the maximum rawness all in the same pack. All files are in universal WAV format at 44.1 kHz sample rate and 16 bits resolution. All samples are curated by Amen.

item.title: Nomad Factory Magnetics Bundle v3.0.2 Incl Patched and Keygen-R2R
item.description:
Team R2R | 2024.06.04 | 36.4 MB
The Magnetics Bundle v3 is a comprehensive collection of three Nomad Factory plugins, including Magnetic 3, Echoes 3, and Cosmos 3. This bundle is the ultimate toolset for bringing tape and analog richness to your mixes, equipped with improved DSP, a resizable UI, and support for the latest audio standards.
item.dc:creator: funtime

item.title: Nomad Factory 80s Spaces v2.4.0 Incl Patched and Keygen-R2R
item.description:
Team R2R | 2024.06.04 | 260.1 MB
80s Spaces is a reverb plug-in that captures the essence of the early digital sound era.

item.title: FeelYourSound Chillout EnginePro v2.1.0 WIN MAC Incl Keygen-R2R
item.description:
Team R2R | 2024.06.04 | 78.1 MB
ChilloutEngine turns your chord progressions into relaxed keys, smooth basslines, memorable hooks, and lovely arpeggios.
item.dc:creator: funtime

item.title: Behringer Vintage v1.0.1.128 Incl Keygen-R2R
item.description:
Team R2R | 2024.06.04 | 37.9 MB
Behringer launched Vintage, a free analog modeling synth, and the German company’s first synth plugin. However, there’s a twist – the plugin isn’t available for download right now.
item.dc:creator: funtime

item.title: BEATS24-7 Trap Sauce WAV MiDi-FANTASTiC
item.description:
FANTASTiC | 02 June 2024 | 328 MB
"Trap Sauce" by Beats24-7 is fully loaded with highly addictive sounds and melodies and your key to professional Beats! Get 5 dope trending Trap Beat Construction Kits inspired by charting artists and producers like Travis Scott, Future, Drake, Cardi B, London On Da Track, Metro Boomin, Gunna, Lil Nas X, Juice WRLD and many more.
item.dc:creator: Fantastic

item.title: Emergence Audio Infinite Upright KONTAKT
item.description:
KONTAKT - 9,06 GB
We’re excited to present Infinite Upright, a masterful textural piano collection crafted by our founder and award-winning composer Michael Vignola. This collection stands as a pinnacle of our commitment to blending organic sounds with cutting-edge sound design techniques, perfect for composers and sound designers seeking depth and innovation in their musical projects.
item.dc:creator: Talula

item.title: Starsky Carr PWM Malevolent Drums WAV Logic-FANTASTiC
item.description:
FANTASTiC | 03 June 2024 | 29 MB
A Sample pack containing 250 analog drum samples from the PWM Malevolent. Old school synthesis for modern sounds. It’s a remarkable little synth to be able to sound like this. Its normally either impossible or almost impossible to get useful tones! Also includes Logic exs sampler files.
item.dc:creator: Fantastic

item.title: Plugin Alliance Unfiltered Audio Battalion 1.0.4 macOS [HCiSO]
item.description:
TEAM HCiSO | 04 June 2024 | 517.48 MB
Sonic pioneers Unfiltered Audio are back with Battalion, an unparalleled auditory experience marrying the timeless tonalities of classic synths with the sampling capabilities of modern drum machines. Battalion’s hybrid design integrates state-of-the-art sampling with deep synthesis capabilities. Traverse sonic landscapes beyond expectation.
item.dc:creator: HoMeCracKeR

item.title: Starsky Carr U-He DIVA JUNO Patch Bank-FANTASTiC
item.description:
FANTASTiC | 03 June 2024 | 161 KB
65 patches based on the capabilities of some of your favourite 80’s synths. Keeping things simple but sounding gloriously vintage - extremely useable tones that will take you back to big hair, mullets and a bit of 80’s glam. I’ve got 4 Juno’s here (106, 60, 6 and Juno2) and I’ve kept things as close as I can. They all have a distinctive edge indefinite character… enjoy.
item.dc:creator: Fantastic

item.title: OCTO8R Acidum for Knifonium
item.description:
Presets | 183Mb
Unwrap and enjoy dirty, fat and bubbling sound of Knifonium that heats your guts with low octave leads
item.dc:creator: Technician1

item.title: MAGIX DNB WAV-Jeggar
item.description:
Jeggar | WAV | 323.81 MB
'DNB' by MAGIX - New underground movement: Crazy synth sounds in the style of The Prodigy together with super fast, complex drum loops for ripping up the dance floor. It's a fantastic set for drum & bass.

Soundpacks from MAGIX contain full orchestral and/or song compositions, broken down into stems or individual samples, with each instrumental stem and sample available in 7 different tonal variations (for example, one bass loop will be available in A, Bb, C, D, E, F and G).
item.dc:creator: PiRAT

item.title: OCTO8R Dazzle for Cherry Audio Memorymode
item.description:
Presets | 131Kb
65 (+28) presets for Memorymore by Cherry Audio unveil the the legendary Memorymoog' s lush and power of analog that dazzled the ear of 80's. 🌌🎼.

Presets include:
Arp - 15 (+5 Bonused)
Bass - 05
FX 5 (+4 Bonused)
Leads 10 (+3 Bonused)
Pad - 15 (+9 Bonused)
Pluck - 15 (+7 Bonused)
item.dc:creator: Technician1

item.title: V Expressions Ltd Master 50 for the Roland TD-6V SYX MiD-ARCADiA
item.description:
Team ARCADiA | Expansion Presets for The TD-6v | 5.95 MB
Based on the success and demand of our famous "Top 50 Drummers" series, the Master 50 is a collection of 50 famous drummer's kits throughout their performing and recording career modeled especially for the TD-6V.
item.dc:creator: PiRAT

item.title: OCTO8R Analog Journey for bx_oberhausen
item.description:
Presets | 37Kb
This presets pack for bx_oberhausen features a wide range of presets allowing you to enjoy the personal journey into the world of legendary Oberheim SEM represented and recreated by Brainworx team. I hope this bank may come in handy as a useful starter-package with 245 presets on the board.
item.dc:creator: Technician1

item.title: OCTO8R Zebra World for uHe Zebralette 3
item.description:
Presets | 146Kb
Taste the sonic of Zebralette3, small sibling of u-He Zebra2.
item.dc:creator: Technician1

item.title: Synapse Audio The Legend HZ v2.0 CE-V.R
item.description:
Team V.R | 5 June 2024 | 128 MB
The Legend HZ has been designed with great care and attention to detail, so that no opportunities were missed to create a software synth which is both highly usable and insanely versatile. It is at heart the product of the combined knowledge of a genre-defining composer and Synapse Audio’s experience emulating an industry-defining synthesizer.
item.dc:creator: hidera

item.title: OCTO8R Monolith for Cherry Audio Memorymode
item.description:
Presets | 24Kb
Atmosphere inspired by the 1968's Space Odyssey and transmitted by Cherry Audio's Memorymode.
item.dc:creator: Technician1

item.title: OCTO8R One Point Six for Tone2 Icarus
item.description:
Presets | 64Mb
This pack is made on the Icarus 1.6 synth. Due to the latest version of Icarus is downward-compatible with all previous versions you may use these sounds in any of the iterations.
item.dc:creator: Technician1

item.title: Unfiltered Audio Battalion v1.0.4-TeamCubeadooby
item.description:
TeamCubeadooby | 06.2024 | 386 MB
Battalion delivers the diverse tonalities and parameters of iconic drum synths with the sampling capabilities and accessibility of modern drum machines. Whether you want to generate solid-studio beats in minutes or tweak and experiment to create something completely original, Battalion has all the tools you need.
item.dc:creator: Mordi

item.title: OCTO8R Spacetime for NI Massive
item.description:
Presets | 46Kb
Spacetime pack for Massive by Native Instruments has 30 morphable presets include 20 Pads and 10 Plucks.
Let cymatics collide into a spot!
item.dc:creator: Technician1

item.title: OCTO8R Hot Ice Beats for Izotope Stutter Edit 2
item.description:
Presets | 49Kb
A really good way to add a touch of absolute madness to your melodies or drum loops with 50 presets for Stutter Edit 2 by iZotope.

Install:
1. Open the Bank Manager
2. Click "Safe As"
3. Copy the Bank file into this folder
item.dc:creator: Technician1

item.title: Octobillion Leads & Plucks for Vital
item.description:
Presets | 83Mb
This is extension for previously released presets pack "Octobillion". It carries 20 morphable Leads and 15 morphable Plucks for Vital synth.
item.dc:creator: Technician1

item.title: Cupwise FX C660 mk3 Tube Compressor (Nebula Library) N2P N2V Skins
item.description:
(Nebula Library) N2P N2V Skins | AudioZ Exclusive | 65.82 MB
This Nebula library is based on a highly regarded modern recreation of the classic 660 compressor. It can sound ‘creamy’, yet still clear and detailed, and that aspect of the sound has been translated to these programs. It has been called the best compressor around for vocals by many, as well as for slamming drums, and among other uses it can even give sounds a nice sheen without engaging the compression, or using very little. Definitely a ‘character piece’. You can also use the pass-through programs which don’t provide any compression but do provide some nice saturation/harmonics.
item.dc:creator: PiRAT

item.title: BeatPhoria Sounds High Spirits Vol.2 WAV
item.description:
04/06/2024 | WAV | 190 MB
Welcome to BeatPhoria! Presenting the High Spirits Vol. 2 Samplepack, filled with beautifully lush and dreamy melodies and vocal textures that are sure to spark creative inspiration.
item.dc:creator: LDVN

item.title: OCTO8R Octobillion Pads [16-45] for Vital
item.description:
Presets | 142Mb
This is extension of 30 morphable pads for previously released presets pack "Octobillion".
item.dc:creator: Technician1

item.title: Black Salt Audio DSR v1.0.3 Incl Patched and Keygen-R2R
item.description:
Team R2R | 04 Jun 2024 | 23.3MB
Quick. Clean. Effortless. De-essing.
item.dc:creator: DECiBELLE

item.title: Black Salt Audio Silencer v1.1.1 Incl Patched and Keygen-R2R
item.description:
Team R2R | 04 Jun 2024 | 20.7MB
Change The Way You Mix Drums
Cymbal bleed is the enemy of great drum mixes. Traditional gates can only help so much before the gating itself becomes obvious. Silencer is the ultimate solution, eliminating cymbal bleed while preserving the integrity of your original sound. It’s not just a gate... it will forever change the way you mix drums.
item.dc:creator: DECiBELLE

item.title: KORG Gadget 3 v3.1.1 macOS-R2R
item.description:
Team R2R | 04 Jun 2024 | 2.60GB
More Powerful Than Ever, Quickly Turn Your Ideas Into Music
A Complete, Seamlessly Integrated Music Production Ecosystem

KORG Gadget is the ideal all-in-one music production software and plug-in suite featuring over 40 small synthesizers/drum machines (“gadgets”), which can be freely combined to create music driven by a powerful yet intuitive user interface. The range of products includes the award-winning iOS version, a Mac version that includes all functions and plug-ins, and a plug-in version that can be used with your favorite DAW on Mac/PC.
item.dc:creator: DECiBELLE

item.title: KORG Gadget 3 Plugins v3.1.1 macOS-R2R
item.description:
Team R2R | 04 Jun 2024 | 5.52GB
More Powerful Than Ever, Quickly Turn Your Ideas Into Music
A Complete, Seamlessly Integrated Music Production Ecosystem

KORG Gadget is the ideal all-in-one music production software and plug-in suite featuring over 40 small synthesizers/drum machines (“gadgets”), which can be freely combined to create music driven by a powerful yet intuitive user interface. The range of products includes the award-winning iOS version, a Mac version that includes all functions and plug-ins, and a plug-in version that can be used with your favorite DAW on Mac/PC.
item.dc:creator: DECiBELLE

item.title: Tac System ONKIO Acoustics v1.2.0-R2R
item.description:
Team R2R | 04 Jun 2024 | 12.5MB
ONKIO Acoustics is a reverb plug-in that perfect reproduces the ONKIO HAUS's acoustics with VSVerb Technology.
